channel.title: Peekture Gallery on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in Peekture Gallery on Yaya's World

item.title: Commissions
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I do commissions! For more information on commissioning me, you can check out the page about commissions. Please note that I only showcase commissions that the original client has given me permission to showcase!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
item.category: map[images:[map[caption:This is a design sheet for a vTuber model I'm designing for a friend! image:JadeDesignSheet.png] map[caption:This is intended as a "BRB Card", something the client can use on stream when they need a break. image:FUNwithPocky.png] map[caption:Jade and I noticed that some emulators work best in their original 4:3 aspect ratio so I made a frame to work with them. image:RetroFrameforJade.png] map[caption:This is the first stab at a streaming frame. I've decided, after doing the retro one to edit this a bit. That'll be done after Thanksgiving image:FirstFrameforJade.png] map[caption:This is a "Stream Starting Soon Card". My client uses it before the stream starts. image:StreamSetUp.png] map[caption:A commission for a friend to gift to their friend whose cat passed away ðŸ¥º image:InLovingMemory.png] map[caption:A cute project commissioned by a friend to draw a friend's vTuber model as Lara Croft. One of my fave commissions! image:ALittleADVENTURE.png]]]

item.title: Wallpapers
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description:
This is a collection of some of my favorite wallpapers. I like vector art and I like wallpapers that aren’t too busy. If you like those things too, then maybe you should download some of these…or not…up to you ðŸ˜œ.

I do not own any of these wallpapers. If I have information on who created it, that information is in the caption! Also for basically all of autumn last year I rocked a very dark theme on all of my devices. This was the Dracrula Theme it was a really cool theme and the macOS wallpaper (there are other versions, check out the site!) for it is included below!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
item.category: map[categories:[map[images:[map[caption:A good wintery picture! image:snowflakes-and-fir-trees.jpg] map[caption:A good, and very green, picture for March! image:clovers.jpg] map[caption:My colorful spring wallpaper! image:spring.jpg] map[caption:And a summer wallpaper too! image:beautiful-summer-landscape.jpg] map[caption:This is actually from the Dracula theme (more on that above) image:macos.png] map[caption:Because sometimes I just want Madoka on my screen! By: illustratedillusions image:kaname_madoka__goddess_madoka.png] map[caption:Cuz it can't just be Goddoka! By: slezzy7_dbdk110 image:kaname_madoka.png] map[caption:Last Madoka, I promise! image:kaname_madoka_reflections.jpg] map[caption:Now for some Gawr Gura, cuz she my favorite vTuber, so there! image:gura_ocean.jpg] map[caption:Gura offers slushie for chu when it hot out! image:gura_slushie.jpg] map[caption:Gura looks cute on halloween! image:gawr_gura_halloween.png] map[caption:I'm more of a macOS girl, and not a fan of Windows even if I still have to use it...so this is my Windows wallpaper XD image:BSOD-Windows8.png]]]]]

item.title: Yaya's Creations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I draw too! That’s right I don’t just play games, but I also like to draw. I will even stream my art, you can check out my past art streams on YouTube. I try to do at least one art stream a week, so please check it out, and check out my finished works below!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
item.category: map[categories:[map[images:[map[caption:My Fiesta character was loosely based off this one, here she's enjoying a warm cup of tea and a Christmas cake and warming herself under a kotatsu table image:KotatsuKurisumasu.png] map[caption:Here's Yayoi again! This time she's having "fun" at the beach, but is all alone ( q . q ) image:SunnyFunALONE.png] map[caption:This a wallpaper from my favorite anime ( ^ w ^ ) image:Wallpaper-Hope.png] map[caption:A darker version of the other wallpaper image:Wallpaper-LostHope.png] map[caption:A new character appears! This little elf fell asleep but was awoken by a very bright light! image:IwasThere.png] map[caption:Kotori surprised Yayoi with a hug from behind! I was too lazy to bother with a background ( o x o ; image:I'llNeverLetGo.png] map[caption:New character! This is Allana from RE[BASE]! image:AllanaDesignSheet.png] map[caption:Allana's Halloween Custom from episode 5 of RE[BASE]! image:HalloweenNite.png] map[caption:Allana may have had a bit too much fun playing a VN...or maybe not enough image:TooMuchVNFun.png] map[caption:The 2023 Christmas Picture (PC Edition) image:CherubicPrayer.png] map[caption:A Christmas Dress for Jade image:JadeChristmasDress.png] map[caption:A new profile peekture for Jade, she's wearing the dress! image:JadeChristmasPP.png] map[caption:It's Keyrie! image:KeyriePP.png] map[caption:My Very Own Stream Frame image:Yayoi_ChiFrame.png] map[caption:Cute Jade as a cat, cutely sleeping... image:JadeNap.png] map[caption:A very unique and special kitty I had the pleasure of drawing! Thankies Twinwhitetiger on Twitch! image:Proto-OtterCat.png] map[caption:The 2024 Christmas Picture (Web Version) image:ANewYearsWish.png] map[caption:I'm no one's pet! This was a fun illustration I did to use for my schedule! image:AmNoOnesPrincess.png] map[caption:What's my favorite thing to do? Play VNs! What's my second favorite? Doing homework ðŸ˜† image:SmortYayoi.png] map[caption:What's my third favorite thing to do? Hang out with Frazzle! image:ADayOutWithaFriend.png]]]]]

item.title: Wall o' ADVENTURE
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Oh boi! I’m not really sure what to do with this one. The original plan was to have screenshots of the ADVENTURES I’ve had in past games, but, with clips on Twitch and my YouTube Archives I’m not really sure any more. I haven’t updated it in ages ðŸ˜… Right now its just a random set of screenshots from one MMO I used to play. Maybe it’ll showcase ADVENTURES I have with kittens? I don’t know yet, thanks for looking though ðŸ˜…
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
item.category: map[categories:[map[images:[map[caption:Helping my Friend's Mage image:Cleric+Mage.png] map[caption:Playing on the beach image:BeachDayFuns.png] map[caption:In matching swimsuits image:MatchyBeachDay.png] map[caption:We got tired after playing image:TiredAfterBeachDay.png] map[caption:New hamster mount image:HamsterFoS1.png] map[caption:Baby won a King Crab mount image:RidingKingCrab.png] map[caption:Its baby-sized! image:KingCrabz.png] map[caption:What happened!? Why am I? Is this heaven? image:WhereAmI.png] map[caption:Crazy fun GM event image:OMFG.png] map[caption:Sooo much red in one spot! image:ThatsALotofRed.png]]]]]
